lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs have a chance to end a 108-year championship drought this weekend as they play in Major League Baseball's World Series, leaving the baseball world grappling with how to handle the turnabout of the sport's "Loveable Losers."

headline.print_headline: Chicago Cubs Look to Shed 'Loveable Losers' Moniker at World Series
headline.main: Chicago Cubs Look to Shed 'Loveable Losers' Moniker at World Series
